headline.print_headline: Insurance Through Work? Health Law Affects You Too
headline.main: Insurance Through Work? Health Law Affects You Too

docs.lead_paragraph: The health care overhaul's reach stretches far beyond the millions of uninsured Americans it is expected to help. It also could touch everything from the drug choices to doctor bills of people who have insurance through work.
docs.snippet: The health care overhaul's reach stretches far beyond the millions of uninsured Americans it is expected to help. It also could touch everything from the drug choices to doctor bills of people who have insurance through work.

headline.print_headline: Black Media Seek Part of Court-Ordered Tobacco Ads
headline.main: Black Media Seek Part of Court-Ordered Tobacco Ads

docs.lead_paragraph: Black media outlets want the nation's tobacco companies to run court-ordered advertisements in their publications as part of a lawsuit charging that the industry lied about the dangers of smoking.
docs.snippet: Black media outlets want the nation's tobacco companies to run court-ordered advertisements in their publications as part of a lawsuit charging that the industry lied about the dangers of smoking.

headline.main: Coming a Long Way on Smoking, With a Way to Go

docs.abstract: Since 1964, when the first “Surgeon General’s Report on Smoking and Health” was released, rates have fallen by more than half, but it remains a killer.
docs.snippet: Since 1964, when the first “Surgeon General’s Report on Smoking and Health” was released, rates have fallen by more than half, but it remains a killer.

headline.print_headline: Smoking Is Worse Than You Imagined
headline.main: Smoking Is Worse Than You Imagined

docs.abstract: Editorial highlights latest surgeon general's report offering astonishing new evidence of just how much harm tobacco causes; criticizes tobacco industry for its aggressive marketing and promotion of cigarettes; calls for more vigorous tobacco-control efforts, and for the Food and Drug Administration to reduce addictiveness and harmfulness of tobacco products.
docs.lead_paragraph: The latest surgeon general’s report offers astonishing new evidence of just how much harm tobacco is causing.
docs.snippet: The latest surgeon general’s report offers astonishing new evidence of just how much harm tobacco is causing.

headline.print_headline: Surgeon General Urges New Resolve to End Smoking
headline.main: Surgeon General Urges New Resolve to End Smoking

docs.lead_paragraph: One in 13 children could see their lives shortened by smoking unless the nation takes more aggressive action to end the tobacco epidemic, the U.S. Surgeon General said Friday — even as, astonishingly, scientists added still more diseases to the long list of cigarettes' harms.
docs.snippet: One in 13 children could see their lives shortened by smoking unless the nation takes more aggressive action to end the tobacco epidemic, the U.S. Surgeon General said Friday — even as, astonishingly, scientists added still more diseases to the...

headline.print_headline: 'Vaping' a Slow Burner in China, World's Maker of e-Cigarettes
headline.main: 'Vaping' a Slow Burner in China, World's Maker of e-Cigarettes

docs.lead_paragraph: When Qu Liang's wife became pregnant, the 30-year-old Shanghai salesman switched from smoking to "vaping", a practice uncommon in China although it is the world's leading producer of electronic cigarettes.
docs.snippet: When Qu Liang's wife became pregnant, the 30-year-old Shanghai salesman switched from smoking to "vaping", a practice uncommon in China although it is the world's leading producer of electronic cigarettes.
